text: World Cup could mean one of these sporting events *FIFA World Cup **FIFA Women's World Cup **FIFA Club World Cup **FIFA U-20 World Cup **FIFA U-17 World Cup **FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup **FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup **FIFA Futsal World Cup *Baseball World Cup *Cricket World Cup *Rugby World Cup *Rugby League World Cup *WGC-World Cup *Speedway World Cup *Volleyball World Cup *Table Tennis World Cup *Alpine Skiing World Cup *Show Jumping World Cup
title: World Cup
